Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; BURNED, OXIDIZED; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with straight rim, short neck, curved walls and convex base. The surface is covered with an orangey-coloured coating. The upper third presents a painted decoration on the basis of geometrical motifs consisting of triangles filled with parallel lines, underneath of which are nine ankh signs in black, framed by two parallel longitudinal lines of the same colour.
